presentation:
Full-stack software developer with **7 years of experience** creating innovative technological solutions for highly regulated sectors such as banking and payments or sectors such as digital marketing, artificial intelligence and software consulting. Expert in **Kotlin, JavaScript and Java,** with a deep knowledge of frameworks such as **Kotlin Multiplatform, React and Spring Boot.**

I have **led multidisciplinary teams** in the implementation of microservices architectures and serverless computing, optimizing application performance and scalability. My experience solving complex problems allowed me to develop features that did not compromise backend performance and delegating loads to the client-side, performing optimizations on the client that **allowed to reduce load times by up to 50%.**

I have strong skills in **DevOps, including CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes,** as well as in **software design, good development practices, and agile methodologies.** I am passionate about new technologies and I stay up to date with the latest market trends. I am looking for new challenges in innovative companies where I can apply my knowledge to create high-quality products.
